title: [Large-scale] PHM Diagnostic Technology Design: System Design Utilizing Domain Adaptation and Data Augmentation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistics and machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Practical, case study-based training for professionals (medical/legal/technical), with content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain quantitative approaches to PHM diagnostic technology and apply them to system design.
Diagnostic models can be improved by utilizing domain adaptation and designable data augmentation techniques.
Deep learning algorithms can be applied to estimate system design solutions with small-scale datasets.
The process of deriving enhanced system reliability probabilities compared to initial designs can be analyzed through case studies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
